item.description: Where are axoloti users going when this forum is down? It might be good if there were a more-or-less agreed on place. The AKSO forum (https://forum.zrna.org/)? The DIY synth subreddit (www.reddit.com/r/synthdiy/)?

item.title: [For Sale] Two Axoloti Core + Hohum lab AxoCtrl case (Spain, ship worlwide)
item.dc:creator: @kr0n Victor
item.description:
Sorry, the site (including the forum) is giving me a lot of 502 gateway errors lately.

I've created a Google Form to get in touch:

docs.google.com

[For Sale] Two Axoloti Core + Hohum lab AxoCtrl case (Spain, ship worlwide)

Like the title says! They're like new, working perfectly and in perfect condition. Unfortunately, I didn't have time to tinker with them that much. I sell all together, core + case. 200€ each. I'm based in Spain, can ship to Europe and I guess, internationally (although never done). The buyer takes care of shipping costs. IMG_9910.jpg1280x960 342 KB IMG_9908.jpg1280x960 319 KB IMG_9909.jpg1280x960 436 KB IMG_9912.jpg1280x960 431 KB

Fill it out with your email, and I'll reply.

item.title: New Axoloti prototype
item.dc:creator: @sebiiksbcs Sebastian
item.description:
I will use the thread over at the lines forum for updates from now on. Or create a new thread from there.

llllllll.co

Axoloti Core & Derivatives

Cheers guys, I am about to give up on the Axoloti forum. ¯_(ツ)_/¯ Also I am reluctant to “release” anything before I get to talk to Johannes, the wise creator of Axoloti. Anyone seen him? What place or forum would be the best for sharing technical...

item.title: Another axoloti core wanted, please
item.dc:creator: @albertpaca sean
item.description:
Hello,
If anyone has an axoloti board they are willing to sell, please let me know - happy to pay reasonable postage to Australia, which is lovely, but far away from everything else.... My board is gone and I need another for a project working with lots and lots of inductors....
Cheers,
Sean.
